ProjectTitle: Understanding role of mechanical forces in human neural tube development and neural tube defects
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/07/2024 [REDACTED] [REDACTED] is a basic but good initial dmp. A few remarks to consider when writing the next version of the dmp: - [REDACTED] only include new data in your data table, but you mention reused data in the next question [REDACTED] your reuse data, please specify the source.” [REDACTED] to add these data to the data table in your next version of the dmp. [REDACTED] the cell lines and plasmids mentioned in your answer to [REDACTED] existing 3rd party agreements restrict exploitation or dissemination etc.” covered in the data table? - [REDACTED] you use human cells or other human bodily material? [REDACTED] so please answer yes tot the question whether there are ethical issues and apply for ethical approval, see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial - [REDACTED] answer to the question [REDACTED] a metadata standard be used etc.” is more relevant for the preceding question about documentation. [REDACTED] you answer yes, you should mention the name of a metadata standard for your research domain, or refer to a metadata scheme developed and used within your research group. [REDACTED] might also refer to the metadata generated by your instruments. - [REDACTED] storage on onedrive, what measures are being taken to avoid loss of data when the researcher leaves the research group? - [REDACTED] you are planning to share human genetics/genomics data please note that sharing in GEO is not compliant with the GDPR, instead you can use EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) according to the procedure from the KU [REDACTED] UZ [REDACTED] [REDACTED] [REDACTED] committee: https://www.uzleuven.be/nl/dac [REDACTED] [REDACTED]
